entry.title: 专利代理人考试
entry.summary:
报名时间：5、6月

考试时间：11月

考试内容：专利法，相关法，主观题

费用：RMB100～200

http://www.mysipo.com/exam.php

http://agent.sipo.gov.cn:8000/sipo/index.action

entry.title: Lines in 'House Of Cards'
entry.summary:
House Of Cards S01E01

  1. give and take
  2. Anger is useless.
  3. There are two kinds pains.The sort of pain that make you strong or useless pain, the sort of pain that is only suffering.
  4. Don't have patience for useless things.
  5. 你的另一半是你最好的队友。

House Of Cards S01E02

  1. What a martyr craves more than anything is a sword to fall on, so you sharppen the blade, hold it at just the right angle, and then 3,2,1..(烈士最渴求的就是壮烈牺牲，所以，你磨好兵刃，调整好角度，默数3,2,1)
  2. She's right.I should take batter care of myself.But it's the principle.I won't be a slave to anybody or anything you can order with a toll-free number.(她是对的，我应该照顾好自己。但这是原则问题。我绝不受任何人或者免费电话能订的东西的摆布。)

House Of Cards S01E03

  1. Power's a lot like real estate. It's all about location, location, location. The closer you are to the source, the higher you property value. 权力正如地产。位置是重中之重。你离中心越近，你的财产就越值钱。
